abstract: Amgen will pay $425 million and perhaps $575 million in milestone payments to BioVex, a maker of experimental cancer drugs.
snippet: Amgen will pay $425 million and perhaps $575 million in milestone payments to BioVex, a maker of experimental cancer drugs.
lead_paragraph: Amgen said it agreed to buy BioVex, a closely held maker of experimental cancer drugs, for $425 million and as much as $575 million in milestone payments.

headline.main: Amgen Buys a Cancer Drug Maker
headline.print_headline: Amgen Buys a Cancer Drug Maker
